Be the one to say NO to Gender Based Violence
I agree that all the information about me is correct and willingly given. I do not support false reporting and I am fully responsible for any report that I make on Gender Based Violence.

\"I was trilled when a few years ago i was selected to take part in an exciting and lively online life coaching course. I am a practical peoerson who is not given to exaggeration, so beleive me when i state that the results of Life Coaching are profound and lasting.\"

Smart Naari presents ordinary Nepali Nepali folks who grew up under some kind of heavy boots and whom may not make it into the history books, but they have a story to tell and we beleive these stories must be heard

string.name: smart_naari_app_details
string.p: Smart Naari is a supportive community helping anyone and everyone to free themselves of gender based violence (GBV) in order to enjoy healthy and safe sexuality and relationships.

The app allows you to instantly report Report Abuse and Violence whenever and wherever you experience it. It offers access to services and the information you need to stand your ground and protect your safety and well-being.
The community nurtures a positive sense of self, self-image and high standards for the quality of our relationships. We empower you to question abusive relationships and refuse to live in fear.

Smart Naari was created by a group of women and men determined to end the silent suffering of thousands of Nepalese experiencing abuse in what should be the safe haven of their own homes and intimate relationships. (See Meet the Team)
Absolute Zero Tolerance of violence.
How? By promoting empowerment, sexual health, sexuality education, good sex, and even stress and anger management as part and parcel of preventing GBV.

Smart Naari brings you the information, access to services and community support to Protect yourself and others against infection, unintended pregnancy, and other potentially negative, physical and emotional effects of unsafe sex. Let’s be:
S afe
M eticulous
A spirational
R ighteous and
T houghtful.
No WOMAN IS AN ISLAND and for that matter no man either.

“Nepali women are at highest risk of physical and sexual violence within the home and marriage rather than from strangers”.
How often do we say "Stop!” to someone abusing us, or intervene in another’s violent domestic dispute? Do we brush off what happens within our own families whilst supporting anti-GBV campaign posts on Facebook? How often have we thought, “ That would never happen to a woman like me...”?
Otherwise, Nepal is known as one of the most remarkable places to live in, and we at Smart Naari intend to keep it that way.

SEX MATTERS to your overall health
. We promote sexual relationships that are consensual and non-exploitative.
We want to help make your voice count. No judgments! We promise. Help us to help you. Talk to us about values, emotions, passions, desires and relationships, stigmas and taboos!

Talking about the "S" word isn’t easy, but we can help you normalise thatdialogue until it becomes easier for you and your partner. Sex is wonderful but it can sting! Learn about safer sex and still have lots offun. We will help you discriminate between life enhancing GOOD SEX behaviours as opposed to pornography, and to understand the pain-pleasure dynamic.
We will empower you to say NO for the sake of love. There is help at the tip of your finger with the Smart Naari app.

WELCOME to the world of SMART NAARI, where you will become a part of creating an ideal Nepali community you always hoped to live in. We believe in your extraordinary potential! Let's cherish and celebrate this amazing life together, shall we?
